classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: ARTD 444 and ARTD 451. For majors only.
description: Students in this advanced studio articulate individual interests and conduct corresponding investigations to develop specialized expertise. The coursework represents the student's final preparation for practice in graphic design. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: ARTD 444 and ARTD 451. For majors only.
label: Graphic Design Capstone
